Description détaillée

EasySDL: Encryption / Decryption management AES 256bits.

Auteur
TAHRI Ahmed
Version
0.9
Date
08-02-2015

EasySDL est une extension de la librairie SDL standard public domain code; OpenSSL EVP apis. Started by Saju Pillai (saju..nosp@m.pill.nosp@m.ai@gm.nosp@m.ail..nosp@m.com) Changed, adapted & improved by TAHRI Ahmed ()

Documentation des fonctions

int aes_init ( unsigned char *  key_data,
int  key_data_len,
unsigned char *  salt,
EVP_CIPHER_CTX *  e_ctx,
EVP_CIPHER_CTX *  d_ctx 
)

Create an 256 bit key and IV using the supplied key_data. salt can be added for taste. Fills in the encryption and decryption ctx objects and returns 0 on success

Documentation des variables

const unsigned char key_data[]
Valeur initiale :
= {
0x00, 0x11, 0x22, 0x33, 0x44, 0x55, 0x66, 0x77,
0x88, 0x99, 0xaa, 0xbb, 0xcc, 0xdd, 0xee, 0xff,
0x00, 0x01, 0x02, 0x03, 0x04, 0x05, 0x06, 0x07,
0x08, 0x09, 0x0a, 0x0b, 0x0c, 0x0d, 0x0e, 0x0f
}
